text: N’iyo umuntu agezweho n’amakuba, asaba Nyagasani we amwicuzaho. Nyamara (Allah) yamuha ku nema ze, akibagirwa uwo yatabazaga mbere, maze agashyiraho ibigirwamana bibangikanye na Allah, kugira ngo ayobye (abantu) kugana inzira ye. Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Inezeze gake mu buhakanyi bwawe! Mu by’ukuri uri mu bazajya mu muriro.”
